qas.question: How many finalists were there on season eight of American Idol?
Who was the first contestant to benefit from the Judges Save?
How many contestants were eliminated during the first week after the judges save?
How many contestants were sent home during the first week of finals?
Who was sent home the week after the judges saved Matt Giraud?
How many finalists were on this season?
How many finalists were eliminated during the first results show?
Which contestant was saved with the first Judges' Save?

context: There were <a0_0><a5_0>13<a5_0/><a0_0/> finalists this season, but <a2_0><a3_0><a6_0>two<a6_0/><a3_0/><a2_0/> were eliminated in the first result show of the finals. A new feature introduced was the "Judges' Save", and <a1_0><a7_0>Matt Giraud<a7_0/><a1_0/> was saved from elimination at the top seven by the judges when he received the fewest votes. The next week, <a4_0>Lil Rounds and Anoop Desai<a4_0/> were eliminated.
